message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SE

This paper discusses the issue of blockchain storage scalability and proposes a solution for low-resource devices such as smartphones. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as it deals with security issues related to blockchain technology. The paper also discusses the design of diet nodes, which suggests that it could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes a method for querying full nodes for shards of the UTXO set, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.SE (Software Engineering).
